attributes.title: OMT Party Dress
attributes.description:
Created on May 3, 2011 by onemangotree on Sourcemap.org:

http://www.onemangotree.com/partydress3.html
Our organic cotton jersey collection is GOTS-certified. We're particularly proud of this Ugandan supply chain - the cotton jersey knit is 100% Ugandan, from seed to textile. We opened a second workshop for our apparel production, located in Kampala. The electrical supply in Gulu was too unpredictable to produce apparel (since garments require electric machine operations). This new workshop enabled us to provide 20 new jobs to individuals in Kampala who lost their jobs when garment factories went out of business. We pay our staff more than double the rate they were paid in the factory, creating sustainable employment without a high price tag for the end consumer.
To shop for our Party Dress, check out www.onemangotree.com

attributes.name: 100% organic cotton knit, 145 GSM
attributes.title: 100% organic cotton knit, 145 GSM
attributes.description:
Phenix knits 100% organic cotton, which is purchased from farmers all over Uganda. Their production is 100% GOTS-certified.
READ MORE: http://onemangotreeuganda.blogspot.com/2010/05/sneak-peak-our-organic-cotton.html

attributes.name: Threads
attributes.title: Threads
attributes.description: We source our apparel threads from the markets in Guangzhou, with the assistance of Ivory, our very favorite Chinese shopper helper.

attributes.name: Neck label printing
attributes.title: Neck label printing
attributes.description: Instead of using tags for printing wash instructions and garment make up, we use small screens to print the information directly onto the garment. Signature Graphics is a Ugandan-owned and operated print shop that does all of our neck label printing. They also do screen-printing on tees, promotional tote bags, etc.
